suncertify.util

Class PropertyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.util.PropertyManager

  • public final class PropertyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to provide read/write access to the suncertify.properties file for user configuration
    Author:
    William Brosnan
